article.title: ACE Electronics to Support Howitzer Digitization
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: ACE Electronics Incorporated, Metuchen, New Jersey, was awarded a $30,519,332 firm-fixed-price contract for production services in support of the digitization of the M119A2 Howitzer. The U.S. Army Contracting Command, Picatinny Arsenal, New Jersey, is the contracting activity.
